oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: So This Is Love - Tommy Cash performance - 1970-07-21
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of So This Is Love, written by Donald Reid and Lewis DeWitt, recorded at the Columbia Recording Studio in Nashville, Tenn. on July 21, 1970, and performed by Tommy Cash (vocals), Jerry Kennedy (guitar), Ray Edenton (guitar), Chip Young (guitar), Roy Huskey Jr (bass), Buddy Harman (drums), and Hargus "Pig" Robbins (piano). Most likely commercial recording (Epic 5-10700).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tommy Cash
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Tommy Cash performs "So This Is Love"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: [Moss Rose Publications letterhead] Memo/letter addressed to Joe [no surname noted] from Shirley [no surname noted] [handwritten] stored with transcription documents, Box 5
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Cash, Tommy; Kennedy, Jerry, 1940-; Edenton, Ray; Young, Chip; Huskey, Roy M.; Harman, Buddy; Robbins, Hargus; Epic Records; Reid, Don, 1945-; DeWitt, Lewis Calvin
